row.process:
:INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_SMB.PRV.INCLUDE.ATTACH :SET &UC4RB_SMB_RECURSIVE_GET# = STR_UC(&UC4RB_SMB_RECURSIVE_GET#) :SET &UC4RB_SMB_TGT_OVERWRITE# = STR_UC(&UC4RB_SMB_TGT_OVERWRITE#) :SET &UC4RB_SMB_PRESERVE_ATT# = STR_UC(&UC4RB_SMB_PRESERVE_ATT#)
:SET &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING# = &UC4RB_SMB_SRC_FILES_DIR# :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CONVERT_BACKWARD_TRAILING_SLASH :SET &UC4RB_SMB_SRC_FILES_DIR# = &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING#
:SET &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING# = &UC4RB_SMB_TGT_FILES_DIR# :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CONVERT_BACKWARD_TRAILING_SLASH :SET &UC4RB_SMB_TGT_FILES_DIR# = &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING#
:SWITCH &$PLATFORM#
:CASE "WINDOWS"
:SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_SMB_SRC_FILES_DIR# :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_CHARS@WINDOWS :SET &UC4RB_SMB_SRC_FILES_DIR# = &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#
:SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_SMB_TGT_FILES_DIR# :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_CHARS@WINDOWS :SET &UC4RB_SMB_TGT_FILES_DIR# = &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#
:JCL_CONCAT_CHAR "?" java -cp "&$AGENT_RESOURCES_CLIENT#smb-tool.jar;&$AGENT_RESOURCES_CLIENT#jcifs.jar" com.uc4.ara.feature.AraFileCmd ? dirfilehandling GetFiles -prc "SMB" ? -h &UC4RB_SMB_HOST# -p &UC4RB_SMB_PORT# -u "&UC4RB_SMB_USER#" -pwd "&UC4RB_SMB_PWD#" ? -src "&UC4RB_SMB_SRC_FILES_DIR#" -tgt "&UC4RB_SMB_TGT_FILES_DIR#" -o &UC4RB_SMB_TGT_OVERWRITE# ? -to &UC4RB_SMB_CONNECT_TIMEOUT# -prv "&UC4RB_SMB_PRESERVE_ATT#" ? -r "&UC4RB_SMB_RECURSIVE_GET#" -smbDN "&UC4RB_SMB_DOMAIN_NAME#" :JCL_CONCAT_CHAR
:INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_CMDLINE_CMD@WINDOWS
:CASE "UNIX"
:SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_SMB_SRC_FILES_DIR# :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_CHARS@UNIX :SET &UC4RB_SMB_SRC_FILES_DIR# = &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#
:SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_SMB_TGT_FILES_DIR# :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_CHARS@UNIX :SET &UC4RB_SMB_TGT_FILES_DIR# = &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#
:JCL_CONCAT_CHAR "?" java -cp "&$AGENT_RESOURCES_CLIENT#smb-tool.jar:&$AGENT_RESOURCES_CLIENT#jcifs.jar" com.uc4.ara.feature.AraFileCmd ? dirfilehandling GetFiles -prc "SMB" ? -h &UC4RB_SMB_HOST# -p &UC4RB_SMB_PORT# -u "&UC4RB_SMB_USER#" -pwd "&UC4RB_SMB_PWD#" ? -src "&UC4RB_SMB_SRC_FILES_DIR#" -tgt "&UC4RB_SMB_TGT_FILES_DIR#" -o &UC4RB_SMB_TGT_OVERWRITE# ? -to &UC4RB_SMB_CONNECT_TIMEOUT# -prv "&UC4RB_SMB_PRESERVE_ATT#" ? -r "&UC4RB_SMB_RECURSIVE_GET#" -smbDN "&UC4RB_SMB_DOMAIN_NAME#" :JCL_CONCAT_CHAR
:INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_SHELL_CMD@UNIX :OTHER : STOP NOMSG, 50, "Unknown Platform" :ENDSWITCH
